bibl.title: Thomas Reddington and Patrick Gallagher v. William Cochrane. Copy of original commitment
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Third Judicial District of Washington Territory

body.p: Territory of Washington } ss. County of King
To any constable and the keeper of the jail of said County:

In hereas Thomas Reddington and Patrick Gallagher of King County have been brought this day before the undersigned, one of the Justices of the Peace in and for said King County; charged on the oath of John constable with having on the 12th day of Sept. 1887 on said county committed the offense of murder, and as conclusion of the examination of said charge is appearing to the said Justice that there is probable cause to charge Thomas Reddington and Patrick Gallagher of the crime of muder committed at the time and place aforesaid and whereas the said Thomas Reddington and Patrick Gallagher have been held without bail for their appearance to answer at the next term of the District Court as required by me.

Therefore you the said Sheriff in the name of the United States forthwith to convey and deliver the said Thomas Reddington and Patrick Gallagher to the said keeper; and you the said keeper and commanded to
receive the said Thomas Reddington and Patrick Gallagher into your custody in said Jail and then and there safely keep until they shall be discharged by due course of law.
H.F. Jones Justice of the Peace in and for King County, W.T.
